author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Telit Communications Says Received Interest From Numerous Parties and Range Of Proposals For Automotive Division
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Telit Communications Plc:
* RESPONSE TO PRESS COVERAGE * NOTES PRESS SPECULATION REGARDING SALE OF ITS AUTOMOTIVE DIVISION​
* RECEIVED INTEREST FROM NUMEROUS PARTIES, RANGE OF PROPOSALS RECEIVED FOR AUTOMOTIVE DIVISION
* ‍BOARD IS NOT CONSIDERING SALE OF OTHER TELIT ACTIVITIES OR DIVISIONS ASIDE FROM AUTOMOTIVE DIVISION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
